          <title>
            <string language="en">Dalton's atomic theory on the alchemist's quest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Daltons Atomtheorie auf der Suche des 
Alchemisten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La théorie atomique de Dalton sur la recherche 
de l'alchimiste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Teoria atômica de Dalton no quest do alquimista</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Teoria atomica del Dalton sulla ricerca del 
alchemist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Dalton ατομική θεωρία στην αναζήτηση του αλχημιστή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Teoría atómica de Dalton en la búsqueda del 
alquimista</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows why lead cannot be transformed into gold through Dalton's atomic theory.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alchemist's quest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">atomic theory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Dalton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Gold</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lead</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, warum kann nicht in Gold 
durch Daltons Atomtheorie umgewandelt werden führen Sie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre pourquoi menez ne peut 
pas être transformé en or par la théorie atomique de Dalton.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra porque conduza não pode
ser transformado no ouro com a teoria atômica de Dalton.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra perchè conduca non 
può essere trasformato in oro con la teoria atomica del Dalton.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει γιατί ο μόλυβδος δεν 
μπορεί να μετασχηματιστεί στο χρυσό μέσω dalton της ατομικής 
θεωρίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra porqué conduzca no 
puede ser transformado en el oro con la teoría atómica de Dalton.</string>
          </description>
